long_description: A fun pair of shoes for work or play, the Mary Jane-style Dansko Kitty Shoes feature soft, tumbled full-grain leather uppers on classic Dansko clog bases. Strobel construction increases flexibility, and 3/4-length tuck boards with riveted shanks increase support. Drilex(R) Ultimate Suede sock linings move moisture away from the feet. Shoes carry the Seal of Acceptance from the American Podiatric Medical Association. The Dankso Kitty Shoes have a 1.5 in. heel height. Removable triple density-molded EVA insoles add cushion; coring holes reduce weight; slip-resistant outsoles provide good traction. Closeout.
short_description: A fun pair of shoes for work or play, the Mary Jane-style Dansko Kitty Shoes feature soft, tumbled full-grain leather uppers on classic Dansko clog bases.
